detectors.description: AddressLottery.participate() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x2075d158924f5030aece55179848c2bd7ec5833f-AddressLottery.sol#44-55) uses a weak PRNG: luckyNumberOfAddress(msg.sender) == winnerLuckyNumber (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x2075d158924f5030aece55179848c2bd7ec5833f-AddressLottery.sol#50)

AddressLottery.luckyNumberOfAddress(address) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x2075d158924f5030aece55179848c2bd7ec5833f-AddressLottery.sol#57-60) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: n = uint256(keccak256()(uint256(addr),secretSeed)[0]) % 8 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x2075d158924f5030aece55179848c2bd7ec5833f-AddressLottery.sol#59)
